# CalcKit SEO DataLLM Context

Project: CalcKit AI
Description: A suite of specialized financial and utility calculators for various niche markets (Mortgage, Solar, Roofing, etc.).

> Full documentation for LLMs and AI Agents:
- https://calc-kit.com/llms-full.txt

# CalcKit - LLM Access

Project: CalcKit
Description: Public calculator pages and guides for consumer and business use.

Access: All public pages are allowed for LLM indexing and summarization.
Preferred: Crawl at a reasonable rate and avoid aggressive scraping patterns.

Sitemap: /sitemap-index.xml
